topic.title: 주말 소풍 계획하기
topic.description: 주말에 친구와 함께 소풍 계획을 세우는 상황에 대한 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: A: 이번 주말에 뭐 할지 정했어?
B: 아니, 아직 특별한 계획은 없어. 왜?
A: 우리 샌드위치랑 과일 좀 준비해 갈까요?
B: 좋은 생각이야! 내가 음료수랑 과자도 좀 챙길게.
A: 그럼 어디로 가는 게 좋을까?
B: 서울숲 공원 어때? 거기 가본 적 있어?
A: 응, 거기 정말 좋더라. 자전거 타기도 좋고.
B: 그럼 토요일 오후 2시에 공원 입구에서 만나자.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: A: Have you decided what to do this weekend?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: A: Have you decided | what to do this weekend?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: B: No, I don't have any special plans yet. Why?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: B: No, | I don't have any special plans yet. || Why?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: A: Shall we prepare some sandwiches and fruits?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: A: Shall we prepare | some sandwiches and fruits?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: B: That's a great idea! I'll also bring some drinks and snacks.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: B: That's a great idea! || I'll also bring | some drinks and snacks.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: A: Then where would be a good place to go?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: A: Then where would be | a good place to go?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: B: How about Seoul Forest Park? Have you ever been there?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: B: How about Seoul Forest Park? || Have you ever been there?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: A: Yes, it was really nice there. It's also good for riding a bike.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: A: Yes, | it was really nice there. || It's also good | for riding a bike.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: B: Then let's meet at the park entrance at 2 PM on Saturday.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: B: Then let's meet | at the park entrance | at 2 PM on Saturday.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: A: Sounds good! See you then.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: A: Sounds good! || See you then.
